metadata.title: USN-6319-1 -- AMD Microcode vulnerability
metadata.description: DaniÃ«l Trujillo, Johannes Wikner, and Kaveh Razavi discovered that some AMD processors utilising speculative execution and branch prediction may allow unauthorised memory reads via a speculative side-channel attack. A local attacker could use this to expose sensitive information, including kernel memory.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6319-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  amd64-microcode - 3.20191218.1ubuntu2.2 No subscription required
